description: Probably from metho- +‎ tre- (“alteration of pteridine”) +‎ (carbo)x(yl)ate.

nouns.description: methotrexate (countable and uncountable, plural methotrexates) (abbreviated MTX)

entries.meaning: (pharmacology) An antimetabolite and antifolate drug used in treatment of cancer, autoimmune diseases, and ectopic pregnancies.
